EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_Ovum_Spring_Boot_Q316.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in Spring Boot. You can read more about it and various Spring technologies and projects here <[[https://spring.io/]]>. For specific information on Spring Boot, check out this page <[[http://projects.spring.io/spring-boot/]]> or start a project with Spring Boot here <[[https://start.spring.io/]]>.
Best, The Pivotal Team
